[Ambrosia]77-chase

Turns out [our]223-our hate is mutual . And this kind of hate is horrifically twisted , filthy , and banging hot . [I]0-i just might have to hate [him]77-chase forever .

8

About [the Author

Pippa Grant]209-the author pippa grant is [a stay - at - home mom]1695-a stay - at - home mom and housewife who loves to escape into sexy , funny stories way more than [she]1695-a stay - at - home mom likes perpetually cleaning toothpaste out of sinks and off toilet handles . When [she]1695-a stay - at - home mom ’s not reading , writing , sleeping , or trying to prepare [her]1695-a stay - at - home mom adorable demon spawn to be [productive members of society]1696-productive members of society , [she]1695-a stay - at - home mom ’s fantasizing about chocolate chip cookies .
